name: Hell Screams
description:
Hell Screams is a free isometric hack-and-slash survival game where you play as May, a 16-years-old nun with some temper issues and a huge holy mace - a dangerous combination for sure. Move through a little hospital and mercilessly crush all the demons that dare to cross your path!

Features
  • 2 weapons, a holy mace and a gun with limited holy water
  • 3 types of enemies, each with his own strengths and weaknesses
  • 8 waves of enemies with incremental difficulty
